title: Open Source Alternative for Project Management Software ...
content: OpenProject is a popular open-source project management software, and its alternatives page provides a comprehensive overview of various competitors. These alternatives cater to diverse needs, including open-source, paid, free, and self-hosted options. The page categorizes alternatives into open-source options like Plane, Focalboard, Huly, Leantime, Worklenz, Vikunja, Kanri, Taiga, Redmine, ProjectLibre, AFFiNE, and Kimai. It also lists paid and free alternatives, including those with free tiers or open-source components, such as Jira Software, ClickUp, Asana, Microsoft Project & Portfolio Management, Basecamp, Bitrix24, Slack, HRMantra, EngageBay, FreshBooks, SAP & Oracle NetSuite OpenAir, QuickReviewer, Wrike, monday.com, Trello, Smartsheet, Airtable, Teamwork.com, Avaza, Bordio, Hive, and Easy Redmine. The page highlights OpenProject's strengths as an open-source solution while acknowledging the diverse landscape of project management tools available in the market.
